name: Dark World Reborning
description:
This is the era of when humans, monsters and magi existing together on the Earth.  Wonderful things exists in this era.   But the whole world is in a dangerous situation, an Evil Empress   who desire for magic power, she prepare to carry out an plan that may cause the Earth fall into chaotic; To become the ruler of everyone, every countries in the World, she  doesn't hesitate to kill one, or even all of a race.

Our heroes who are people from different races, however they have a same goal that is to stop this evil Empress,  save the world. Will they able to do it?

Enjoy the journey into the wonderland, fight  monsters, looting treasures and customizing your characters in your own way
